name: sondbound
description: SÖNDBÖUND editor inside VS Code (Webview wrapper around the built-in audio editor).
categories.name: sondbound-workspace
categories.description: SÖNDBÖUND monorepo workspace (backend + VS Code extension under ./vscode-extension).

scripts.package:extension: npm --prefix vscode-extension run vscode:prepublish && npx --yes --prefix vscode-extension @vscode/vsce package
